text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product title.

Product title:
LMP-F270 - Lamp With Housing For Sony VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, VPL-FX40L Projectors

Product features:
Bulb With The Housing
AuraBeam Economy Series Television Replacement Bulb.
This is an Aurabeam Economy Series lampl For a Brighter & Sharper Picture look for the Aurabeam Professional Series replacement lamp.
180 Day Warranty Included.
Exclusive Bulbs is the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps

Product description:
text.Response A: AuraBeam Economy Series Television Replacement Bulb. This is an Aurabeam Economy Series lampl For a Brighter & Sharper Picture look for the Aurabeam Professional Series replacement lamp. 180 Day Warranty Included. Exclusive Bulbs is the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps.
text.Response B: This LMP-F270 Lamp with Housing is an exclusive Aurabeam Economy Series replacement lamp that will give you a brighter and sharper picture for your Sony projector.  The lamp is designed to provide you with the same performance, durability, and service life you expect from the OEM.  This lamp is compatible with the following Sony projectors: VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, VPL-FX40L.  The lamp comes with a 180-day warranty and is only available through Exclusive Bulbs, the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

962.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product title.

Product title:
LMP-F270 - Lamp With Housing For Sony VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, VPL-FX40L Projectors

Product features:
Bulb With The Housing
AuraBeam Economy Series Television Replacement Bulb.
This is an Aurabeam Economy Series lampl For a Brighter & Sharper Picture look for the Aurabeam Professional Series replacement lamp.
180 Day Warranty Included.
Exclusive Bulbs is the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps

Product description:

Response A

AuraBeam Economy Series Television Replacement Bulb. This is an Aurabeam Economy Series lampl For a Brighter & Sharper Picture look for the Aurabeam Professional Series replacement lamp. 180 Day Warranty Included. Exclusive Bulbs is the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps.

Response B

This LMP-F270 Lamp with Housing is an exclusive Aurabeam Economy Series replacement lamp that will give you a brighter and sharper picture for your Sony projector. The lamp is designed to provide you with the same performance, durability, and service life you expect from the OEM. This lamp is compatible with the following Sony projectors: VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, VPL-FX40L. The lamp comes with a 180-day warranty and is only available through Exclusive Bulbs, the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps.
